episodes.title: Discover Ceremonies of a Mystical Cult of Islam | Our World
episodes.description:
This film follows a community of Kurds resident in Iran who are followers of the Quadiri order, a mystical cult of Islam. During rituals they have the power to carry out extraordinary acts of faith which under normal circumstances would be harmful. Subscribe to Our World: https://bit.ly/3xnPuGL

Groundbreaking and internationally acclaimed anthropological series featuring intimate portraits of tribal peoples and remote communities across five different continents.

This film was first broadcast: 27 Nov 1973

Explore Our World and watch some of the most successful nature documentary series about the environment and the wonders and dangers nature has to offer. We will be posting some of the longest-running and most successful nature documentary series, revealing the trials and tribulations of life on Earth and often for the first time, the secrets of the natural world in all its wonder.
